availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Married to Sarah "Sally" Brook Goghegan in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on May 2, 1830. Resident of Nicholas County in 1840. Owned one enslaved person in Nicholas County in 1840. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Employed John S. Poisal as a farm hand in Nicholas County in 1860. Employed Nelson Taylor as a laborer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1860.
